`https://github.com/clMathLibraries/clRNG`


## Fisher test simulation

```{r packages, results='hide'}
library('gpuR')
```

Create some streams
```{r test}
x = vclVector(5.2,5.3,type="double")
y = vclVector(4.1,6.1,type="double")

Nglobal = 256
streams = clRNG:::cpp_mrg31k3pCreateStreams(Nglobal)
t(streams)
if(gpuInfo()$maxAllocatableMem > 1e10) {
  NperItem = 500
} else {
  NperItem = 100
}
z = vclVector(length=as.integer(Nglobal*NperItem), type=theType)
length(z)

clRNG::fisher_simGpu(x,y,z,streams=streams)

```
